name: Almond Butter Cookies
author: In memory of Hazel Monsignor Ray Orf's housekeeper
instructions: Beat well, margarine, cream cheese, baking powder, salt and 1/2 cup sugar. Add 1 teaspoon almond extract and flour. Then mix well. Mix remaining sugar and almost extract together, set aside. Roll the dough rectangle shape about 1/4 thick. Sprinkle with sugar and fold in half again. Continue until you are left with a small rectangle. Slice and bake 350 degrees for 10 to 12 minutes.
